items.title: Awesome Building Blocks for Web Apps
items.content_text:
### UI Elements

*   [Tailwind UI](https://tailwindui.com/) - UI components, by the creators of Tailwind CSS.
*   [Highcharts](https://www.highcharts.com/) - Interactive charts for web.
*   [Themesberg](https://themesberg.com) - Bootstrap templates, themes and UI kits.

### Booking

*   [YouCanBookMe](https://youcanbook.me/) - Online scheduling for teams.

### Consent Management

*   [Cookiefirst](https://cookiefirst.com/) - Cookie consent manager.
*   [UniConsent](https://www.uniconsent.com/) - Consent management platform for GDPR, CCPA, COPPA compliance.
*   [React Cookie Consent (‚≠ê619)](https://github.com/Mastermindzh/react-cookie-consent) - A small and customizable cookie consent bar for React applications.
*   [React Cookie Banner (‚≠ê182)](https://github.com/buildo/react-cookie-banner) - React cookie banner which can be automatically dismissed with a scroll.

### Media

*   [Spotify web playback SDK](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-playback-sdk/) - Client-side JavaScript library which allows you to create a new player in Spotify Connect and play any audio track from Spotify in the browser via encrypted media extensions.
items.content_html:
UI Elements

  • Tailwind UI - UI components, by the creators of Tailwind CSS.
  • Highcharts - Interactive charts for web.
  • Themesberg - Bootstrap templates, themes and UI kits.

Booking

  • YouCanBookMe - Online scheduling for teams.

Consent Management

  • Cookiefirst - Cookie consent manager.
  • UniConsent - Consent management platform for GDPR, CCPA, COPPA compliance.
  • React Cookie Consent (‚≠ê619) - A small and customizable cookie consent bar for React applications.
  • React Cookie Banner (‚≠ê182) - React cookie banner which can be automatically dismissed with a scroll.

Media

  • Spotify web playback SDK - Client-side JavaScript library which allows you to create a new player in Spotify Connect and play any audio track from Spotify in the browser via encrypted media extensions.
